page.title: 08Our School 3.
page.content: We learn tables but we also do weighing in grammes,measuring in metres although sometimes in shops they still use yards,and volume in litres even though our milk comes in pints.We write our own stories and poems.We all love reading and read to our teacher every day as well as choosing other books to read in our free time.Every year we have a school outing with the parents and playgroup. We might go to Watermouth Castle or Cricket St.Thomas. Sometimes when we are doing projects we go to museums.In the summer term the Juniors go to Pinkery Camp.We have a Harvest Festival in October in school.We have Fireworks on Bonfire night in the field.We have a lovely Nativity Play and Carol Service in the Church at Christmas when we sing and sing and sing.
